sci.crayfis.shramp.util

Class HandlerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sci.crayfis.shramp.util.HandlerManager

  • public abstract class HandlerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the creation and finish of all running threads. Call newHandler() to start a new thread, and finish() to shut all threads down.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HandlerManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void finish()
      Shut down **all** running threads started by this class
      static android.os.Handler newHandler(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Integer priority)
      Start up a new thread named 'name' with priority 'priority'

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
